nPCAspect: is very pleased to see you
is flushed and hungry for you
nPCPreamble: You hurry towards her. She's waiting for you
You know she will go with you if you ask
walkaway: You avert your eyes and hurry past
turndown: You shake your head and turn away
failDialog: +n blushes, shakes her head and walks away
failRoom: +n's eyes widen in horror. She gather her things and storms out
diagAdvance: You feel +n has grown much closer
diagComplete: +n is now ready to take things further
diagFailure: +n has been unmoved by your advances
roomAdvance: +n is starting to enjoy this. She's willing to go further
roomComplete: +n's corruption is total. She'll do anything you ask
roomFailure: You didn't manage to get +n excited

playerDialog.text: I really like you +n.
I think you're really pretty +n.
You seem sad.
Do you feel cold and lonely at night?
I so like spending time with you
Can we be friends?
Were you watching me at prayers?
Nice to see you again.
Can I kiss you?
You’re looking nice today
Would you like to hold my hand?
So good to have a friend here.
I know it’s not allowed but would you like to be my girlfriend?
Do you think two girls can love each other?
Have you ever thought of being with another girl?
Please hold me +n. I’m feeling so lonely.
I’d so like to see you without your habit.
Would you like to come back to my cell?
I want to touch you, to please you, to make you happy.
Would you like to kiss me? Properly. On the lips.
You make me feel all tingly between my legs.

responses: That’s a nice thing to say
Oh yes. I sometimes miss my family
I do feel so cold and alone all the the time
We can’t chat for long. We need to concentrate on our duties
Mmm. It’s nice to catch up
I really like being with you too.
I’d so like to be your best friend.
<Lowers gaze> I really, really like you.
<Big smile> Lovely to bump into you again.
Please, don't make me do this.
Oh yes! I so want this.+a:1

playerAction.text: Tidy a strand of +n's hair behind her ear.

responses: +n turns her head away in disgust
+n shuts her eyes and doesn't resist
+n's lips meet yours in a soft kiss
+n does not respond and looks at you in horror
+n accepts your embrace, her hands slipping round your back.
+n hugs you tightly. You can feel the warmth of her body against your own
You feel her start but she doesn't pull away
+n's eyes flicker slightly as she enjoys the attention
+n tenses up. She is very nervous.
+n pulls away and slaps your hand
With a little moan, +n cups your breast and caresses it gently
